page.title: 12SOUTH ASCOT INDUSTRIAL AREA
page.content: This small Industrial Area is on the south side of Ascot Railway Station and is made up of five firms. Oakley Animal Products makes cat and dog food from animal carcases.It employs about 23 people and is owned by Mr. Jackson.Charringtons Solid Fuels distributes coal to the local domestic users and gets its supplies in bulk via British Rail.Eric Whites Garage are the local agents for Citroen cars.They have a body shop that repairs damaged cars and small forecourt that sells petrol. Camberly Roofing are a local building and roofing firm that has a small office and yard behind Whites.
